welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ryhope, a charming and picturesque town in the United Kingdom known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newcastle Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Newcastle Airport handles freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tees Valley Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tees Valley Airport handles all freight and cargo operations, providing efficient and secure transportation of goods.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
